1521.title: yoshino "yoshi" fujieda

15211.content:
In the city that was home to DATS headquarters, Yoshino "Yoshi" Fujieda was on break, taking the time to do her shopping. Walking down the entertainment district, groceries in her hands, her stomach suddenly grumbled loudly. Blushing, she put a hand over it.

"Was that you, Yoshi?" Lalamon chimed in from her Digivice iC.

"I should really get something to eat..." she muttered. Only thing is, she couldn't decide what to have excallty. There was a lot of places to eat out at.....

What would she have?
15211.title: Yoshino

15213.title: The Bridge Bunnies?

choices: A Digimon bio-emerges from the Digital World!
Thomas comes in...he doesn't look so good.
152131.content:
*Another day, another ....lack of Digimon emerging.....* thought Megumi as she scanned the console she was working, absentmindedly munching on some manjuu...that stuff was delish! *Just the luck that this city had the best manjuu shop...I can't get enough of it! * Her mind wandered as she thought about the delicious sweet bean cakes...and so did her hand....

...down to her waistline. Her definitely larger waistline. Lack of field work and her constant munchies for the had a unwanted effect on her waist line...her uniform was definitely tighter, especially around the chest. *It's not that much of a problem...it's not like I'm going to get field duties anytime soon.* she though as her hand wandered back up to the monjuu box. Still, someone had to have noticed by now....

"Megumi!" Commander Sampson's voice broke through her thoughts and back to reality. "Stop snacking and focus on your console!"

She uttered a rushed "Y-yes sir!" before putting her full attention back on the computer screen. She could hear Miki utter "Busted." from across the room before the Commander told her to focus as well.

It didn't take long for something to happen, though.
152131.title: "Dull moments are made better with food."

152132.content:
*Nothing, nothing...something..no, it's nothing.* "*sigh*" Miki let out a sigh of boredom as she stared at her computer screen, the lack of activity frustrating her. To calm herself, she took a bite of manjuu. The confectionary was sweetly delicious...addicting! *What luck that the city that DATS sets up in has the best candy store around......this manjuu is to die for!* she thought with delight.

Of course, with her new addiction came consequences. She had......put on a bit of weight. Her uniform felt tight, especially her kneehigh stockings...she could feel their pinch. *What a pain....* she thought, with another manjuu in her mouth. *I don't want get resized for a new uniform...Yoshi and Megumi won't hesitate to tease me for it!* As she finished off the Manjuu in her mouth, she realised two things. One was that she was out of Manjuu, and two.....something was emerging form the digital world!

She went into operation mode quickly as the alarm begun to blare. She could hear Megumi also getting to work from across the room. "Something's emerging from the Digital World!" she announced. "Do we know what it is yet?" the Commander spoke, with his trademark seriousness in his voice.

"Finding out now." Miki announced with certainty. Soon, she had the annomly up on on screen, and where it was emerging from. "Scanning it now............."

15222.title: Here's the furry opti-oh. Oh dear.....

choices: Two needles are injected into her arms...
A pipe drops down from the roof and connects with her mouth....
152222.content:
Renamon woke with a start. She had been searching for Yuma after those Demi Devilmon had taken her, but she....she.....she...what was she doing again....she had been searching Process Factory for Yuma, yes, then had fell something prick her on her neck...then she had gotten drowsy..then she woke up here.

Where was she now? The floor was riveted steel, the walls were made of rivets, pipes and metal the roof was pipes on pipes...and she could hear the steady thump of the machines that ran Process Factory...so she hadn't moved from where she was originally....wait. She couldn't move her arms or legs. A quick glance around told her why: her arms and legs were chained to a big slanted steel slab, which she was spread out on like a Starmon.

"What's.............what's going on!? Hello?" she called out, but got no answer. She fell silent, waiting for a reply.....then there was a hiss of machines, and suddenly-
152222.title: FAP HARD

choices: She makes it out with no more complications.
1522221.content:
-two long, mechanical spindly arms, with large USB-like needles on the ends emerged from the sides of the slab and proceeded to inject themselves into her sides. Renamon winced in slight discomfort as as the USBs proceeded to empty their payload within her, and then retract back into the slab, and the chains that held her arms and legs released themselves and also retracted back into the slab, before the slab went vertical and she tumbled forward, landing on all fours. "Wha...?" she uttered as she stood up, confused as to what happend. Now that she was free, she could get back to her goal of finding Yuma, but she had to find a way out. She looked around, and found a corridor leading out from the room. She began to make her way down it....

And that's when it happened. She stumbled as he body being to swell outwards with flab, knocking her off balance. 'AH!" she yelled in shock, as her breasts and stomach surged out in front of her, and her hips and butt swelled out behind her, rounding out her frame. She stumbled for a bit more, groping at herself in shock, before the growing stopped. She was much large, plushier and fatter now, with a belly like a tire, boobs as big as basketballs, upper arms as thick as as a drainpipe, and was could only be described as a couch-crushing rear, with an ass like over-blown exercise balls which tapered down into meaty upper thighs and swollen lower thighs. "What...was in those USBs?" she wondered, still groping at her new body. She started off again soon after she stopped groping herself. Yuma wasn't here, and if she was in danger, it would be no good to hang around here...besides, that might not be the only surprise this place, or whoever had stunned her, had in store for her...!


(Reference Picture: https://www.furaffinity.net/view/2174686... )

choices: "Yes, but it won't matter in the long run."
15333221.content:
".....And that's pretty much it, Chief Julia."

Julia nodded in response. "I see. Good work, Sayo. You are dissmissed for today."

Chaos Gallentamon spoke up as well. "Stay alert, though. We may have another mission for you soon."

"Understood, Chief!" was her reply.

With a salute, Sayo then walked off, probably to head back home to fiddle with her Digifarm, or go shopping, leaving Juila and Chaos Gallantamon alone with the sever keepers, who never bothered the Leader of Night Fang on duty. And since they never bothered her.....

She could have a snack.

Julia pulled a chocolate bar from her pocket, opened it, and and shoved as most of the melted part into her mouth before biting, chewing and swallowing it. She took a moment to clean her mouth using her tongue, before unwrapping the chocolate bar some more and taking another bite.
The munching sounds attracted her partner's attention, an C. Gallentamon took this moment to speak up about something that had him concerned recently. "Julia....partner, don't you think you're eating a bit too much recently?" he asked. Juila finished off the chocolate bar fully before responding with.......
15333221.title: Night Fang's (CHUBBY) Leader

info.brief_description: this is a wg story for females that have been in the digimon world games
info.description:
this is a weight gain story for females that happen to be in the digimon world games *that includes yoshino from digimon world data squad*

1. no sex of any kind
2. keep it PG 13
3. this is only for the games from the digimon world Branch so no anime (the only exception that I know of is Yoshino from digimon savers)
4. if you show a character that I don't know that is in the digimon world games you have to have proof
5. only females are allowed to gain
6. have fun with it
7. it is only for weight gain
info.pretty_title: digimon world weight gain female only
